MobyGames Description

Take control of a transforming mech in Los Angeles and clean up the crime that is running rampant throughout. Use powerful weapons to destroy anything in your way, remember...serve, protect and survive!

Game Information
Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯Ã‚Â¯
Found the game (CloneCD format in RAR Archive) on the eDonkey P2P Network with luck. Tested on Windows XP Home Edition and everything works; used Daemon-Tools to mount the CD Image. [Alt]+[TAB] (Multi-Tasking) doesn't work too well with the game. Installation is pretty standard. And you can play one-on-one with an AI or with a friend. TCP/IP is one way to connect in Multiplayer. Gamepads/Joysticks work with this game too. Game controls are in-game, you can find it in the Preferences section then the Controller Configuration section.  More info in the AGC-readme_(fclapd).txt file.

The Torrent comes with a NoCD crack and Glide update patch.

File size comparison between RAR and Extracted contents:

478MB RAR
743MB Extracted
